oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1949-07-31 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1949-07-31 (unconfirmed), part 1. Personnel include Louie Buck (host), Ott Devine (announcer), Beasley Smith (conductor) and the Lion Orchestra (performer), Snooky Lanson (performer), Dottie Dillard (performer), the Old Hickory Singers (performers), and Charlie Ackerson (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Snooky Lanson; Dottie Dillard; Charlie Ackerson; Beasley Smith; Lion Orchestra
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra) -- Opening statement (Ott Devine) -- Opening statement (Louie Buck) -- Everywhere You Go (Snooky Lanson) -- Louie Buck introduces Dottie Dillard -- My Silent Love (Dottie Dillard) -- Louie Buck introduces Ott Devine -- Lion Oil commercial (Ott Devine) -- Louie Buck introduces Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra -- Bali Ha'i (Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra) -- Louie Buck introduces Charlie Ackerson -- Charlie Ackerson talks about his money-back-guarantee record -- I Had My Heart Set On You (Charlie Ackerson) -- Louie Buck introduces the Old Hickory Singers) -- Tuck Me To Sleep In My Old 'Tucky Home (Old Hickory Singers) -- Louie Buck and Snooky Lanson talk [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Lanson, Snooky; Dillard, Dottie; Old Hickory Singers; Ackerson, Charlie
